Class LocalServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.remotese.transport.java.LocalServer

    public class LocalServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerNode
    Server side of the 1 to 1 local transport for unit testing purposes only one server, only one client initied by the LocalTransportFactory
